required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioavailability and Pharmacokinetic Measures of H. Procumbens Extract
clinical_study.official_title: Study to Establish the Bioavailability and Pharmacokinetic Measures of H. Procumbens Extract in Humans

brief_summary.textblock: Study will define the bioavailability and short term pharmacokinetics of the principal secondary metabolites of a aqueous-ethanolic extract of H. procumbens in non-enteric and enteric capsules.

detailed_description.textblock: The study(n = 12) will use a one-dose design to measure bioavailability and pharmacokinetic properties of an aqueous extract of H. procumbens containing 100mg harpagoside. Plasma levels of harpagoside, harpagide, verbascoside, and 8-p-coumarylharpagide will be measured for 24 hours with blood collections taken at timed intervals.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximal concentration level of Devil's Claw metabolites, Cmax (ng/ml)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0.5 hour, 1 hour, 2 hours, 2.5 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours, 6 hours, 7 hours, 8 hours, 9 hours, 10 hours, 12 hours
primary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn at predefined intervals following administration of one dose of study drug

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours, 6 hours, 8 hours, 10 hours, 12 hours, 24 hours
primary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn at predefined intervals following administration of one dose of study drug

primary_outcome.measure: Determination of terminal half-life of Devil's Claw, t 1/2 (h)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 hour, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours, 5 hours, 6 hours, 8 hours, 10 hours, 12 hours, 24 hours
primary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn at predefined intervals following administration of one dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels of harpagoside
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after dose of Devil's Claw
secondary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn for Devil's Claws metabolites at Visit 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels of harpagide
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after dose of Devil's Claw
secondary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn for Devil's Claws metabolites at Visit 2

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma levels of verbascoside
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after dose of Devil's Claw
secondary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn for Devil's Claws metabolites at Visit 2

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 hours after dose of Devil's Claw
secondary_outcome.description: Blood will be drawn for Devil's Claws metabolites at Visit 2

arm_group.description: H. procumbens 100 mg in enteric coated capsules
H. procumbens 100 mg in non-enteric coated capsules

intervention.description: Enteric coated capsules containing Devil's Claw extract with 100mg harpagoside
Non-enteric coated capsules containing Devil's Claw extract with 100mg harpagoside
